reviewText:
Early Access Review

Was a tester on this game pretty much from the beginning and the developer has made significant changes that has made the game better and better with each iteration!.

We all have played freeze tag at some point in our life and this game looks to recreate that in a futuristic way.The game has quite a few classes most which are super fun and you start to find a favorite real quick!...the great thing is each class has its advantages and not one really upstages the other.Its Light hearted and nerve racking fun especially when max players are in game. With so many games released on steam greenlight that makes you go...what?, Quantum Lock seems to aim to be and is one of the better games to pass greenlight. The developer is easygoing, knowledgeable , a true adult and not a Criticism baby (qualities not every dev on steam has),

Quantum Lock for the Win!
voteText: 5 of 8 people (63%) found this review helpful 1 person found this review funny

reviewText:
Early Access Review

This game has my stamp of approval.

Has dance party skill what more do you need to know.

But if you want to know more. It is fun game to play with all of its crazy skills and interesting maps.
Makes me think of when i used to play Freaze tag as a kid.

I was a tester since early and have played more than what it says on steam. Still fun great fun to play :D

reviewText:
There're two teams: Anti-Virus and Rogue Programs.

The Anti-Virus must tag all the programs before time runs out. Each team has multiple classes to choose from, each with 4 unique abilities such as lasers, missiles, warp fields, mines, and turrets. Overall this is a visually stunning game with amazing gameplay.

It does need some balance tweaks though. And make sure you have a friend or two to play it with, because there aren't usually online games up.

Graphics 9/10
Gameplay 9/10

reviewText: Early Access Review\n\nAs being a tester since day 1, this game has brought nothing but a fun filled adventure. It has that nice casual appeal to enjoy with anyone that is also having a great time with the game. Using your abilities to cause a laugh or strategically is entirely up to you! But Don't get tagged from it!

reviewText: For a cheap game, it gives some pretty matches. Once you learn how your AV and Rouge Virus works, the game comes down to tatics rather then who can move faster.

reviewText: Fantastic game! It's simple and clever, I just wish I could get into a game with more than just my little group of friends. I'm not sure why I can't see any games and have to host and invite friends through steam but it is really fun anyway.
